県立病院: (けんりつびょういん) - prefectural hospital
県立高校: (けんりつこうこう) - prefectural high school; public high school
県立高等学校: (けんりつこうとうがっこう) - prefectural senior high school; public senior high school
県級市: (けんきゅうし) - county-level city (of China)
県花: (けんか) - prefectural flower; floral emblem for a prefecture
県警察学校: (けんけいさつがっこう) - prefectural police academy; prefectural police training school
県警察本部: (けんけいさつほんぶ) - prefectural police headquarters
県農業試験場: (けんのうぎょうしけんじょう) - prefectural agriculture experimental station
眞言: (しんごん) - true word; mantra; Shingon (Sino-Japanese esoteric Buddhism, originating in the eighth century)
眞面目: (まじめ) - diligent; serious; honest; sober; grave; earnest; steady
真: (canela/palácio) - true , truth, reality, genuineness; seriousness; logical truth; printed style writing
真しやか: (まことしやか) - plausible (e.g. of a rumour); believable (e.g. of a story); specious (e.g. of an argument); credible (e.g. of a lie); looking very like the truth
真っしぐら: (まっしぐら) - (usu. as まっしぐらに) at full speed; impetuously; precipitately; headlong
真っ二つ: (まっぷたつ) - in two equal parts
真っ二つに: (まっぷたつに) - right in half
真っ先: (まっさき) - the head; the foremost; beginning; the very front
真っ只中: (まっただなか) - right in the midst of; right at the height of
真っ向: (まっこう) - directly opposite/right in front; middle of the forehead; helmet front
真っ向から: (まっこうから) - right in front of; head-on; downright
真っ向勝負: (まっこうしょうぶ) - head-on fight; direct confrontation; head-to-head contest
真っ向法: (まっこうほう) - makko-ho (set of four exercises for general health)
真っ唯中: (まっただなか) - right in the midst of; right at the height of
真っ平: (まっぴら) - (not) by any means; (not) for anything; humbly; sincerely
真っ平ご免: (まっぴらごめん) - had enough/flatly refusing/wouldn't do for anything; begging pardon
真っ平御免: (まっぴらごめん) - had enough/flatly refusing/wouldn't do for anything; begging pardon
真っ当: (まっとう) - proper/respectable/decent/honest; (全う only)   entirely/completely/wholly/perfectly
真っ暗: (まっくら) - total darkness/pitch dark; bleak future/poor prospects
真っ暗闇: (まっくらやみ) - pitch dark; total darkness
真っ最中: (まっさいちゅう) - midst; middle of; height of
真っ正面: (まっしょうめん) - directly opposite; right in front
真っ白: (まっしろ) - pure white; blank (e.g. mind, paper)
真っ盛り: (まっさかり) - height of; middle of; full bloom
真っ直中: (まっただなか) - right in the midst of; right at the height of
真っ赤: (まっか) - bright red/deep red/flushed (of face); downright (e.g. lie)/complete/utter
真っ赤っ赤: (まっかっか) - very bright red/deep red/extremely flushed (of face); downright (e.g. lie)/complete/utter
真っ赤なうそ: (まっかなうそ) - complete lie; outright lie
真っ赤な嘘: (まっかなうそ) - complete lie; outright lie
真っ逆さま: (まっさかさま) - head over heels; headlong; head first
真っ逆様: (まっさかさま) - head over heels; headlong; head first
真っ青: (まっさお) - deep blue/bright blue; ghastly pale/pallid/white as a sheet
真っ黒い: (まっくろい) - pitch black; deep black
真っ黒け: (まっくろけ) - pitch black; completely black
真っ黒気: (まっくろけ) - pitch black; completely black
真で書く: (しんでかく) - to write in the square style
真に: (しんに) - indeed; really; absolutely; truly; actually; very; quite
真にもって: (まことにもって) - in all sincerity; truthfully; honestly
真に受ける: (まにうける) - to take seriously; to believe
真に迫る: (しんにせまる) - to be true to nature; to be lifelike
真の: (しんの) - true; real; genuine; proper; utter
真の部分要素: (しんのぶぶんようそ) - proper subelement
真ん中: (mannaka) - meio, centro, centro, ponto médio, coração
真ん丸: (まんまる) - (also まん円) perfect circle
真ん丸い: (まんまるい) - perfectly round; perfectly circular
真ん円: (まんまる) - (also まん円) perfect circle
真ん円い: (まんまるい) - perfectly round; perfectly circular
真ん前: (まんまえ) - right in front; just opposite; under the nose
真ん真ん中: (まんまんなか) - dead center; dead centre; right in the middle
真一文字: (まいちもんじ) - (yoji) straight; as the crow flies
真丹: (しんだん) - (orig. from the Sanskrit 'Cinasthana') (ancient) China
真人: (もうと) - Mahito (highest of the eight hereditary titles); (まうと, もうと only) you (referring to someone of lower status)
真人間: (まにんげん) - an honest man; a good citizen
真似: (mane) - imitando, copiando, imitação; comportamento, conduta, ação
真似事: (まねごと) - sham; make-believe; mere form
真作: (しんさく) - authentic work (as opposed to a fake)
